languages.text: "Мы пытались арестовать его, но каждый раз ему удавалось ускользнуть. Епископ Иеронимус направился туда, чтобы убедить его сдаться миром, но также не преуспел в своей миссии. Во имя безопасности Футфола Токара должен быть схвачен".

"We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."
languages.original_text: "Мы пытались арестовать его, но каждый раз ему удавалось ускользнуть. Епископ Иеронимус направился туда, чтобы убедить его сдаться миром, но также не преуспел в своей миссии. Во имя безопасности Футфола Токара должен быть схвачен".

traits.locale_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: “我们曾多次试图逮捕他，但他每次都躲掉了。希罗尼穆斯牧师曾试图说服他老老实实投降，但也同样没有成功。为了保证落脚港的政权完整，我们必须逮捕托卡拉。”
languages.original_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."

traits.locale_text: “我们曾多次试图逮捕他，但他每次都躲掉了。希罗尼穆斯牧师曾试图说服他老老实实头像，但也同样没有成功。为了保证落脚港的政权完整，我们必须逮捕托卡拉。”
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: 「我々は、奴を逮捕しようと何度も試んだ。だが、奴は毎回逃げ切った。ヒエロニムス司祭は現地に赴き、奴に静かに降伏するよう説得した。だがその努力さえも失敗に終わっている。フットフォールの為を思うならば、なんとしてもトカラを逮捕しなければならない」
languages.original_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は、奴を逮捕しようと何度も試んだ。だが、奴は毎回逃げ切った。ヒエロニムス司祭は現地に赴き、奴に静かに降伏するよう説得した。だがその努力さえも失敗に終わっている。フットフォールの為を思うならば、なんとしてもトカラを逮捕しなければならない」
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: «Hemos intentado arrestarlo sin éxito varias veces. El reverendo Hieronymus ha ido para intentar convencerle de que se rinda, pero sus esfuerzos han sido en vano. Debemos detener a Tocara por la integridad de Paso».
languages.original_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos intentado arrestarlo sin éxito varias veces. El reverendo Hieronymus ha ido para intentar convencerle de que se rinda, pero sus esfuerzos han sido en vano. Debemos detener a Tocara por la integridad de Paso».
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Wir haben schon mehrfach versucht, ihn zu verhaften, doch er ist der Gefangennahme jedes Mal entwischt. Reverend Hieronymus ist zu ihm gereist, um ihn zu überzeugen, sich friedlich zu ergeben. Doch auch diese Bemühungen haben nicht gefruchtet. Im Interesse der Integrität Footfalls muss Tocara festgesetzt werden."
languages.original_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben schon mehrfach versucht, ihn zu verhaften, doch er ist der Gefangennahme jedes Mal entwischt. Reverend Hieronymus ist zu ihm gereist, um ihn zu überzeugen, sich friedlich zu ergeben. Doch auch diese Bemühungen haben nicht gefruchtet. Im Interesse der Integrität Footfalls muss Tocara festgesetzt werden."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: « Nous avons déjà tenté de l'appréhender à plusieurs reprises, mais il est parvenu à s'échapper à chaque fois. Le révérend Hiéronymus s'est rendu sur place pour le convaincre de se rendre, mais jusqu'ici, ses efforts sont restés vains, eux aussi. Dans l'intérêt de l'intégrité de Castel, il est nécessaire d'arrêter Tocara. »
languages.original_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons déjà tenté de l'appréhender à plusieurs reprises, mais il est parvenu à s'échapper à chaque fois. Le révérend Hiéronymus s'est rendu sur place pour le convaincre de se rendre, mais jusqu'ici, ses efforts sont restés vains, eux aussi. Dans l'intérêt de l'intégrité de Castel, il est nécessaire d'arrêter Tocara. »
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda

languages.text: "Onu tutuklamak için birkaç teşebbüste bulunduk ancak her seferinde kaçmayı başardı. Muhterem Hieronymus, onu usulca teslim olması için ikna etmeye gitti ancak onun çabaları da aynı şekilde sonuç vermedi. Binliman'ın bütünlüğü için Tocara tevkif edilmeli."
languages.original_text: "We have made several attempts to arrest him, yet he has evaded capture each time. Reverend Hieronymus has gone there to convince him to surrender quietly, but his efforts have likewise been unsuccessful. In the interest of Footfall's integrity, Tocara must be apprehended."

traits.locale_text: "Onu tutuklamak için birkaç teşebbüste bulunduk ancak her seferinde yakalanmamayı başardı. Muhterem Hieronymus onu usulca teslim olması için ikna etmeye gitti ancak onun çabaları da aynı şekilde sonuç vermedi. Binliman'ın bütünlüğü için Tocara tevkif edilmeli."
traits.speaker: FootfallCh04_Chorda
